column3: if the current wind speed is less than NUMBER_0 mph , tweet something .
column4: $dialogue @org.thingpedia.dialogue.transaction . execute ; @org.thingpedia.weather . current ( ) filter wind_speed <= NUMBER_0 mph ; @com.twitter . post ( ) ;
